text: Yeemene maraw!sheetan maaqattootii kee gititte makataatina usuk siinik naqboytak, kaadu sheetanti maaqattootii kee gititte kataate mari, toysa diggah usuk (sheetan kinnuk) elle amrisam qaxuma taamaa kee ceelewayto, kaadu Yallih muxxóo kee kay Racmat sin amol aneewannay inkinnah hebeltô num siinik saytunnoowak mananna abe dambik, kinnih immay Yalli dambik isih faxa mara saytunnoysa isi naqoosak, Yalli sin maxcoocá yaabbi, sin taamoomi yaaxigi
